basics.name: Arun Kumar T K
basics.label: Web developer
summary: I'm a passionate Web developer with 5+ years of experience in web app design and development
I've co-founded a web startup called 'HedCET' during my college days,which went on to make some cool products in the intellectual property domain.
I completed my graduation in Electronics and Communication Engineering from the esteemed College of Engineering, Trivandrum .
When I'm not coding I like going through wikipedia articles and tech blogs; Tinkering with gadgets; Watching Atletico Madrid matches; Adding new books to my calibre library; Watching movies.

work.summary: Leading software development for the IP products initiative - Leap. My key responsibilites include leading the web full stack development for all products, Product architecture, DB design etc
highlights: Drafter : AI & ML based drafting tool for patent prosecution. Lead the design and development of the product. Developed using NestJS, NextJS, MySQL, React, D3, Recharts etc. Ongoing project.

Insights : AI & ML based Patent Data Analytics Tool. Lead the design and development of the product. Developed using Express, MySQL, React, D3, Recharts etc. Completed project. http://insights.leap-ip.com/
Worx : Collaborative patent prosecution workbench. Designed and Developed the product. Developed using Bonita, Express, MySQL, React, D3, Recharts etc. Ongoing project. http://worx.leap-ip.com/

Spectrum : Auto Docketing + Auto IDS with workflows and intuitive dashboards. Designed and Developed the product. Developed using Bonita, Express, MySQL, React, D3, Recharts etc. http://spectrum.leap-ip.com/

Patent Data Accumulators + ETL tools : Set of crawlers to scrape data from patent websites such as USPTO Public Pair, Espacenet, WIPO, Indian PTO etc, OCRs image files, populate the data in a data warehouse. Developed using Nightmare, Cheerio, Talend, MySQL, MongoDB etc
Other Products : Proofreading Report Generation, Patent Term Adjustment (PTA) Calculator, Patent Family Tree Generator, Virtual Patent Marking Tool etc.

work.summary: I've co-founded HedCET technologies pvt ltd in 2011 during my graduation days. In 2013 HedCET signed an agreement with clairvolex.inc and have since develped many IP products assisting various stages of patent prosecution and litigation.
highlights: Developed a mail client called TinyMail
Developed Beehive an ERP software for the schools and colleges.
